metadata.synopsis: SCL Haven: Isobel is kidnapped/killed and shadows engulf the inn, combat starts against the shadows. At some point a huge tentacle emerges from the fountain in the middle of the yard, destroying the fountain. Player character has a PAD comment on the event.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter Haven (Last Light). Use debug book command "Set quest flags" -> Act2 -> Haven -> Siege -> Start Siege right awayOREnter Haven, go to Isobel room, kill Isobel (can kill marcus too).Fight through the Siege

0.text: What in the hells is that?
